message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be highly valuable to you. I'm asking for $10,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $10,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $10,000 reflects the true value of this product, I understand your position. Would you consider meeting me halfway at $8,000?
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to consider $7,500?
